name: $RALF
description: The official website for $RALF, the real ass funklord lizard. A humanoid reptilian sent to conquer Earth who instead fell in love with funk and now pumps bags with his blessed music.
prompt: The user wants to rebrand their meme coin website from $BILO to $RALF. This involves changing the name, color scheme (to purple, yellow, black, white), updating the hero video, and adding lore about the new character, Ralf. The UI should also be updated to include a link to an NFT launchpad and a new pill icon for the pump.fun link.
